Jobs Tracker

This app can be used to manage your potential job leads. Each job lead includes the company name, telephone number, its website URL, and your brief comments about the company. Open the nav drawer to view the navigation menu. You will be able to invoke the app\'s functions. You will be able to access the following screens:

Add job leads
Here, you will be able to provide the information about the new job lead. You will be able to enter multiple job leads from this screen.

Review job leads
Here, you will be able to review all of your job leads. You will be able to search for a specific job of interest. Just tap on the magnifying glass icon on top of the screen and then enter a keyword. Your job leads will be filtered based on the keyword and you will see only job leads with the keyword in the company name or in the comments section. While on this screen, you will also be able to add a new job lead, should you choose to do so. Tap on the round Plus button at the bottom of the screen and enter a new Job Lead information into the dialog box.

Close app
The app will be closed.

Get help
Useful help information about the app will be displayed.
